item.title: The Nevanlinna-Pick Interpolation Problem
item.description:
Title: The Nevanlinna-Pick Interpolation Problem

Speaker: John Kyei

Date: Thursday, July 2nd

Time: 2:00pm

Abstract: In this presentation, I will give an introductory discussion on the general Nevanlina-Pick Interpolation problem . Formulation of the Pick Problem and the nature of solutions to the Extremal Pick Problem. Subsequently, Nevalinna Formulation. We will also look at the Finite Blaschke Products, Basic analytic and algebraic properties such as the characterizations of holomorphic functions on the disk, approximation and Differentiation of the Finite Blaschke Product.

Link to Zoom Meeting: https://zoom.us/j/99109270972
